ComicInfo.Summary: The town's destroyed and most folks are either dead or carried off into the night by them green-skinned sonsabitches. Mankind's only hope... a handful of rednecks holed up in a tiny farmhouse. Outnumbered, out-gunned, out-brained. But as long as a fella's too stupid to know he's beat, then there's a chance. And our heroes are pretty stupid.
ComicInfo.Title: About Damn Time
ComicInfo.Writer: Todd Farmer,Steve Niles,Thomas Jane,Todd Farmer,Steve Niles,Thomas Jane
